/* 보증금 환급 관리 */ SELECT DRH.deposit_refund_histroy_code AS depositRefundHistroyCode, DRH.user_id AS userId, DRH.user_name AS userName, DRH.account_user_name AS accountUserName, DRH.bank_name AS bankName, DRH.account_number AS accountNumber, DRH.deposit_refund_result AS depositRefundResult, cast(DRH.up_datetime AS CHAR(20)) AS upDatetime FROM deposit_refund_histroy AS DRH order by length(DRH.deposit_refund_histroy_code),DRH.deposit_refund_histroy_code
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{rowPerPage};
/* 기준 행 계산*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM deposit_refund_histroy
/* 컵 대여 보증급 기준 조회 */ SELECT cup_rental_price FROM cup_price_standard

/* 보증금 기준 관리 */ SELECT wds.waiting_deposit_standard_code AS waitingDepositStandardCode, wds.waiting_deposit_period AS waitingDepositPeriod, wds.set_datetime AS setDatetime, wds.admin_id AS adminId, wds.up_datetime AS upDatetime FROM waiting_deposit_standard AS wds
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{rowPerPage};
/* 기준 행 계산*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM waiting_deposit_standard

/* 보증금 결제 관리 */ SELECT DPH.deposit_pay_histroy AS depositPayHistroy, DPH.user_id AS userId, DPH.charging_amount AS chargingAmount, DPH.payment_method AS paymentMethod, CAST(DPH.pay_application_datetime AS CHAR(20)) AS payApplicationDatetime, CASE DPH.payment_method WHEN '계좌이체' THEN CAST(DPH.pay_application_datetime AS CHAR(20)) ELSE CAST(DATE_ADD(DPH.pay_application_datetime, INTERVAL DPH.waiting_deposit_period DAY) AS CHAR(20)) END AS waitingDepositDatetime, IFNULL(DPH.deposit_completion_datetime,'') AS depositCompletionDatetime, SC.code_middle_type AS codeMiddleType FROM deposit_pay_histroy AS DPH INNER JOIN static_code AS SC ON DPH.static_code = SC.static_code order by length(DPH.deposit_pay_histroy),DPH.deposit_pay_histroy
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{rowPerPage};
/*결제 행 조회*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM deposit_pay_histroy AS DPH

/* 보증금 관리 조회 */ SELECT DPRH.user_id AS userId, DPRH.past_holding_deposit AS pastHoldingDeposit, DPRH.deposit_pay_use_history AS depositPayUseHistory, DPRH.deposit_using_type AS depositUsingType, DPRH.past_holding_deposit+DPRH.deposit_pay_use_history AS currentHoldingDeposit, cast(DPRH.up_datetime AS CHAR(20)) AS upDatetime FROM deposit_pay_refund_history AS DPRH order by length(DPRH.deposit_pay_refund_history_code),DPRH.deposit_pay_refund_history_code
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{rowPerPage};
/* 기준 행 계산*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM deposit_pay_refund_history
/* 사용중인 만료기간 */ SELECT wds.waiting_deposit_period FROM waiting_deposit_standard as wds WHERE wds.waiting_deposit_period = #{waitingDepositPeriod};
